dev-master.name: xtech/oauth
dev-master.description: PHP 5.3+ extends lusitanian/oauth by adding additional services

suggest.symfony\/http-foundation: Allows using the Symfony Session storage backend.
suggest.predis\/predis: Allows using the Redis storage backend.
suggest.ext-openssl: Allows for usage of secure connections with the stream-based HTTP client.
suggest.lusitanian\/oauth: Is the base that oauth lib that these services are created from.
